website_summaries.verdict: With both long and short sleeve options, you're sure to find a set for any season. Prized by kids who hate itchy tags and rough seams.
pros: Soft, warm fabric that's good for cozy days
Cotton knit with pull-on pants that are easy for kids to get on and off
Both long and short sleeve options, in many colors
cons: Fabric may be slightly see-through in lighter colors

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and high-quality fabric. Our daughter asked for star pajamas for Christmas, and these were perfect. She loves them. They have held up very well in the wash. The sizing is “as expected,” with the shirt running slightly tight, as many kids’ pajamas do. We are very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Reader10234

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Buying more when they restock.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these jammies! She will try to wear them all day. She loves getting dressed and going on adventures so having her try and sit around all day in them is a testament to their comfort. They fit just as I expected for their size, as soon as they get some more in her size in stock I am buying more.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter- she loves them to sleep in, but also to just lounge around on these cold wet winter days. Very soft, wash and dry well - no shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, easy care Pj set
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, washed beautifully and did not shrink. My 11 year old granddaughter loves it and it fits her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: Cloth used: Soft and smooth Cutting: Good Work: Good Overall: Really good for sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfortable, a bit "see-through"
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes these comfy pajamas. They fit as expected and are not too tight. Her only complaint is that the fabric is a bit too "see-through" for her likes.
customer_reviews.author: desertmama

customer_reviews.title: Leaves color everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Either this product is fake or CK has really gone down in quality. This sleepwear I got for my kid leaves color everywhere on furniture (had hard time getting rid off on white chair), on her hands. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cpk

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm!!
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas made my granddaughter so happy! She said they were comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.author: B.D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are so soft and comfortable. I ordered a size up and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Lavisai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pjs
customer_reviews.text: A little large but that's ok, room to grow. The material is very soft and my child really enjoys sleeping in them so far. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: herrera33392

customer_reviews.title: Soft and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and good quality. My daughter would like to wear this every night. I am going to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: salorrii

customer_reviews.title: Total yes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and says they fit well. They are just what we were lookin for
customer_reviews.author: Brian avis

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect!But it is still good.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a very high-quality product. It was still shaking the yarns the top. The waist is very wide.
customer_reviews.author: Suada

customer_reviews.title: sizes can differ
customer_reviews.text: Bought pink and blue, and the pink outfit fits perfect, and the blue pants must be mislabeled because they are way to big...
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Lank

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap material , not sure if it’s Really Calvin Klein or a knockoff. Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Louis Uhrle

customer_reviews.title: Great pjs
customer_reviews.text: Wow loved these pjs ended up buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Manal C

customer_reviews.title: it fits my daughter she is nine .
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is average size Nine years old and it fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Baharak zamanpourb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pajama set
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas were so cute. My daughter really loves it. Says it comfortable, soft and silky. I really recommend this outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is see through looks low quality the contrary to what you would expect from a name brand
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It’s too tight for the size
customer_reviews.text: It was the correct size but the shirt was too tight
customer_reviews.author: Peter Renwick

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It was a little small on top but bottoms fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Teri Villastrigo

customer_reviews.title: Great Pajama
customer_reviews.text: Great pajama. Fit my 9 year old as expected. Soft material and comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and so soft
customer_reviews.text: Omg these pajamas are SO soft and comfortable! These have been my daughters go to pajamas ever since she got them! They are pretty thin but would be great for fall or spring pajamas. Love the color, the bottoms are a bit big on her but that’s no fault of the pajamas, my daughter is very small and thin and typically wears a size down on pants! These pajamas are perfect for my daughter who wants to wear less cartoony baby girl clothes and more of a mature girl style! The softness and comfortabliltiy is beyond and can’t recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Lee4kids

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: I love this pajama set on my little one! She wears it all the time and I have washed it at least 5 times now over all this time. The fabric is very soft and it has not faded. I recommend this for your little one! I ordered a size up so it would fit comfortably and last her a little longer. Pic for reference! **If this review was helpful, please take a literal second to press the button below and let Amazon know. Thank you!**
customer_reviews.author: HappyWife

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Colorful Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old daughter has an array of pajamas. I got her this one to try, and she's been wearing it comfortably and happily for a couple of months (along with some others), both at home and on sleepovers at friends' houses. The material is soft, and it has held it's softness after several washings. The stitching and color also are good, and have held up well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schenker

customer_reviews.title: 100% soft cotton
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the color and its softness. It's made of cotton and even the interior part behind the CK logo is also soft. No scratchy parts, which my daughter was looking for since she detests uncomfortable tags & such. The size 8 fits her well. The cut is like a long-johns type of PJs. I wash it on warm setting in my washing-machine and dryer. I think it shrunk lengthwise but only by a few centimeters. Not noticeable. Vastly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RomRVier

customer_reviews.title: So soft! My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 and wears a 7. I usually buy a size bigger in pajamas and I got a size 8 and they fit well! She is a slender body type and it fits well but the sleeves are very fitted and the waist is elastic so I'm not sure a fuller body type will fit as well/as comfortable. The shirt is so soft and the pants are nice and thin so no worries about getting hot at night. These definitely have room length wise to grow into! My daughter LOVES these!
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: 100% cotton pj's. SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Great pj set! It's hard to find 100% cotton kids' pajamas. I prefer them, as we all seem to sleep better in natural fibers. These are a soft aqua-turquoise. The top is tagless and just has the words Calvin Klein on it. The bottom has tags and has little hearts printed on it. These washed and dried with no shrinking and stayed soft with out balling up. This size 8 fits my 7y.o. with a smidge of room to grow. She's 48 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mama

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them pjs! The color is great and they are so comfortable. My only negative is that they are very thin, I feel like the fabric could have been a little thicker. They are well made and they wash and dry very well. She normally wears a 6 but I wanted them to be a little looser so I ordered up and got a size 8 and I am happy with the way they fit her.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, didn't shrink, comforatble
customer_reviews.text: These PJs are great and my size 7 daughter fit into the size 8 and has room to spare. What to know is that these didn't shrink in the wash at all, they are true to size and the material is on the thinner side (not Hanna Andressen thick) They are also very cute on so they get 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft pajamas
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter loved receiving these pajamas. She usually wears a size small, but is starting to outgrow that so these fit perfectly with a bit of room to grow. The are extremely soft, and comfortable. She likes the design on the pants. I could live without the words Calvin Klein across the shirt, but she doesn't mind. The feel and look well made. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight && Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas from Calvin Klein fit my little girl perfectly! She is somewhere between a 9/10 and also on the lean side. They have that snug fit to them but not in a tight restricting way. I have washed and dried them multiple times and they have held up beautifully. I wash and dry my clothing on the hottest setting, too. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Recommended item
customer_reviews.text: This set is so soft and comfortable on her and I love the look and feel of it but not as much as she does. It fits her perfectly and it is well worth the price. If this review helped you make an informed buying choice please let me know by leaving a Helpful vote. I hope you have a WONDERFUL shopping experience!
customer_reviews.author: LifePathin4D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cozy
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous pajamas for my daughter. The fit is exactly as expected (and can easily be sized up to get more wear) and nice, soft fabric. My favorite part is the comfortable waist band of the pants. They're very stretchy. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Loves Books

customer_reviews.title: So soft and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter's PJ day at school and she got tons of compliments. The color is beautiful and the fabric is really soft. They fit exactly as expected and are holding up wonderfully. These are great and I'd highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Thraddash

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein Girls' 2 Piece Sleepwear
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas, they look and feel great and daughter wears them all the time. The fabric is nice and it is easy to wash. I also like how she can wear these on most nights and stay warm. I am happy I got them for her and I definitely recommend the Calvin Klein Girls' 2 Piece Sleepwear.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Serna

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: The PJs are meant to be snug--they are snug, the child says they are comfy. The shade of green is pretty and they are stylish.
customer_reviews.author: sunday

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Color
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the minty aqua color and these are ooo so soft. Quality made, wash nice and the girl says they're really comfy too. Can't ask for much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small but super adorable and fancy looking pajamas. Love the color and the simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, love the color
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable 2 piece pajama set. Silver Calvin Klein lettering on the front. They wash well. No shrinkage. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurs and Mermaids, mom of both

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk
customer_reviews.text: Thin and run tight. Got a medium for my 8 year old and noticed immediately after washing that it had shrunk considerably.
customer_reviews.author: PartyofFive

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: This PJ set is nice fabric. I also love the light blue color.
customer_reviews.author: DebraS

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Girls' Little 2 Piece Sleepwear Top and Bottom Long Sleeve Pajama Set Pj
product_meta.description: A lightweight fleece construction Makes these girls' Calvin Klein pajamas a cozy and comfortable choice for bedtime.
feature_bullets: A lightweight super soft cotton construction makes these girls' Calvin Klein pajamas a cozy and comfortable choice for bedtime
Pants feature an elastic waistband featuring the iconic Calvin Klein logo
